name: iPhone 14
description: The iPhone 14 features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and 5G connectivity for a faster, smoother experience.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23
description: The Galaxy S23 boasts a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, and a powerful triple-camera system for stunning photos.

name: Google Pixel 8
description: With Google Tensor G3 chip, a 50MP camera, and AI-powered features, the Pixel 8 delivers an exceptional Android experience.

name: OnePlus 11
description: The OnePlus 11 offers a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a powerful 50MP camera system.

name: Xiaomi Mi 13
description: The Mi 13 delivers flagship performance with its Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset, 50MP Leica camera, and vibrant AMOLED display.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Galaxy S21 is a pro-grade phone with a 6.5-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, and exceptional camera capabilities.
